name: 曾德樟
objective:
本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析．課程大綱包括：
1. Introduction
2. Fundamentals of Signal and System Analysis
3. Modulation Techniques with Emphasis on Analog Systems
4. A Brief Review of Probability Theory and Random Processes
5. Noise Effects in Analog Modulation Systems
6. Fundamentals of Basic Binary Digital Communication Systems
schedule:
1. Introduction (1 week)
2. Fundamentals of Signal and System Analysis (4 weeks)
(1) Signal models and signal classifications
(2) Fourier series and the Fourier transform
(3) Signals and linear systems
(4) The Hilbert transform
3. Modulation Techniques with Emphasis on Analog Systems (3 weeks)
(1) Linear modulation
(2) Angle modulation
(3) Analog pulse modulation
(4) Multiplexing
4. A Brief Review of Probability Theory and Random Processes (3 weeks)
(1) Random variables and statistical averages
(2) Random processes
(3) Correlation and power spectral density
(4) Narrow band noise
5. Noise Effects in Analog Modulation Systems (3 weeks)
(1) Signal-to-noise ratios
(2) Noise and phase errors in coherent systems
(3) Noise in angle modulation
6. Fundamentals of Basic Binary Digital Communication Systems (3 weeks)
(1) Baseband data transmission in white Gaussian noise
(2) Binary data transmission with arbitrary signal shapes
(3) Modulation schemes not requiring coherent references
scorePolicy:
1. 期中考
2. 期末考
3. 作業
4. 出席率
materials: R. E. Ziemer & W. H. Tranter, “Principles of Communications, Systems, Modulation, and Noise 6/E,”Wiley, 2010 (偉明圖書: Tel. 2363-8586, 2363-6567)
